mapper.insert: insert into BOARD_TABLE(boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPass, boardContents) values(#{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardContents})
mapper.select: select id, boardTitle, boardWriter, boardHits, formatdatetime(createdAt, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as createdAt from BOARD_TABLE order by id desc
mapper.update: update BOARD_TABLE set boardHits=boardHits+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPass, boardContents, boardHits, formatdatetime(createdAt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') as createdAt from BOARD_TABLE where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update BOARD_TABLE set boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContents=#{boardContents} where id=#{id}
